# endOfEncoderSampleIndex

**Instance Property**

An index within a counter sample buffer that tells the GPU where to store counter data from the end of a blit pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var endOfEncoderSampleIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property indicates where the GPU stores the counter data within an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCounterSampleBuffer] instance that it samples at the end of a blit pass.

You can tell the GPU to skip sampling at the end of the blit pass by assigning [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCounterDontSample] to this property.



## Configuring the sample buffer attachment

- **sampleBuffer**: A specialized memory buffer that the GPU uses to store its counter data during the blit pass.
- **startOfEncoderSampleIndex**: An index within a counter sample buffer that tells the GPU where to store counter data from the start of a blit pass.
